title: Abercrombie's Spring Sale Is Here, Shop Our Favorite Picks For 25% Off
description: Who would have thought that our closets would be filled with Abercrombie & Fitch again?! Abercrombie has long been famous for its expansive collection of flattering jeans, which are editor-loved. But recently, the retailer went through a little makeover of its own; long gone are the days of logo-filled graphic T-shirts and limited denim offerings, now the brand is a haven for all types of fashion-lovers - and sizes. It's the best place to shop for everything from stylish, elevated basics to vintage-inspired looks, seasonal trends, and even wedding guest dresses. The brand is clearly back and better than ever, and if TikTok hasn't already convinced you to shop at Abercrombie, let us do that for you. From trendy tops and elevated dresses to comfortable, tailored bottoms, Abercrombie has become synonymous with effortlessly chic clothing. Plus, if something doesn't fit quite right, or the color you've been eyeing is finally back in stock, the brand makes it convenient to file a return or exchange. We love browsing the site for the brand's newest arrivals and even scoring a deal or two on a few pieces. So we rounded up our current favorite wardrobe essentials and dresses from Abercrombie, both new and on sale, so you know what's worth buying. Keep reading to shop our top picks from Abercrombie & Fitch, or jump ahead to the category you're looking for.
author: Anvita Reddy
excerpt: Shop our current favorite clothes from Abercrombie & Fitch.
text: Abercrombie & FitchWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.Who would have thought that our closets would be filled with Abercrombie & Fitch again?! Abercrombie has long been famous for its expansive collection of flattering jeans, which are editor-loved. But recently, the retailer went through a little makeover of its own; long gone are the days of logo-filled graphic T-shirts and limited denim offerings, now the brand is a haven for all types of fashion-lovers — and sizes. It's the best place to shop for everything from stylish, elevated basics to vintage-inspired looks, seasonal trends, and even wedding guest dresses. The brand is clearly back and better than ever, and if TikTok hasn't already convinced you to shop at Abercrombie, let us do that for you. From trendy tops and elevated dresses to comfortable, tailored bottoms, Abercrombie has become synonymous with effortlessly chic clothing. Plus, if something doesn't fit quite right, or the color you've been eyeing is finally back in stock, the brand makes it convenient to file a return or exchange. We love browsing the site for the brand's newest arrivals and even scoring a deal or two on a few pieces. So we rounded up our current favorite wardrobe essentials and dresses from Abercrombie, both new and on sale, so you know what's worth buying. Keep reading to shop our top picks from Abercrombie & Fitch, or jump ahead to the category you're looking for.PS Photography | Marisa PetrarcaBest Tank Top From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Essential Scoopneck Tank ($19, originally $25) The Essential Scoopneck Tank and Abercrombie & Fitch is a wardrobe staple you'll use year round, so you might as well stock up on a few of them while it's on sale. The top is made of 95 percent cotton and five percent elastane, which makes it both soft and stretchy. Get the style in a variety of neutral colors and patterns that are perfect for pairing with multiple pieces. Check out our editor's complete review of the Essential Scoopneck Tank here. Editor Quote: One of our editors loves it so much, she has one in nearly every color. "It boasts a slim but not-too-tight fit that's casually sexy. (And no, I can't see my seamless bra through it!) It looks chic worn on its own or underneath a jacket . . . it lands just above my belly button, which I love because I'm almost always wearing high-waisted bottoms." - Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, ShoppingPS Photography | Kyley WarrenBest Tailored Pants From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Sloane Tailored Pant ($20, originally $90) These pants are not only one of the brand's bestsellers, but they're also loved by TikTok. The bottoms are perfect for creating a put-together, elevated look, whether you're going out for brunch or enjoying post-work cocktails. Plus, the wardrobe essential is available in eight core colors and a few limited edition colors on sale. Read more in our editor's in-depth review of the Sloane Tailored pant. Editor Quote: "The material feels cooling on the body, almost like a spandex type of fabric. And despite their casual fit, the pants also look undeniably flattering while on, thanks to their tailored drape and pleated accents. I'm happy to wear them to a work event or just while lounging around the house; they truly work for every occasion." - Kyley Warren, former assistant editor, Shopping abercrombie.comBest Mesh Top From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Draped Mesh Top ($30, originally $40) This mesh top is a stylish layering piece you can wear for a night out. Featuring a slightly ruched bodice and asymmetrical hemline, this mesh top has a slim-fitting silhouette with a tuckable length. Perfect for concerts, festivals, or just a girls night out, you can get creative with how you style this versatile piece.abercrombie.comBest Slim Fit Top From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch The A&F Paloma Top ($38, originally $50) The A&F Paloma Top will be your new wardrobe essential, and several prints and colors are on sale right now. Its slim-fitting silhouette hugs you in all the right places, while the ruching details make it all the more flattering. abercrombie.comBest Dipped-Waist Dress From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Dipped-Waist Sweetheart Maxi Dress ($40, originally $120) This gorgeous Dipped-Waist Sweetheart Maxi Dress delivers main character energy. Perfect for dinner dates or dressier events, this piece has a gorgeous dipped waist detail and a voluminous skirt. If you're a bride, the color is ideal for any pre-wedding photoshoot.abercrombie.comBest Crewneck Sweater From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch The A&F Madeline Crew Sweater ($45, originally $60) Available in several prints and colors, The A&F Madeline Crew Sweater is a bestseller worth stocking up on for the fall and winter. Several styles are on sale, including festive fair isle patterns. It's made from a soft yarn fabric that makes you feel cozy even if you dress up. Pair it with jeans or a skirt with a loose French tuck for an elevated look. PS Photography | Shari StrakerBest Leggings From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch YPB sculptLUX 7/8-Length Leggings ($49, originally $65) The YPB sculptLUX 7/8-Length Leggings are an editor-backed favorite for their flattering yet supportive wear. Made with a sweat-wicking four-way stretch fabric, these leggings ensure you feel comfortable no matter how you move. They are sculpting and smoothing without feeling too restrictive, and they boast a hidden interior waistband pocket. Read more of our thoughts on Abercrombie & Fitch's YPB Activewear here. Editor Quote: "I could see myself lounging around the house in this (which I did), running errands, and working out. I kept checking the tag because the material is so comfortable, and I just had to know what it was made out of. The leggings are super high-waisted, which I love, especially for working out. The design initially caught my eye because it's different from any athleisure outfits I've been seeing lately." — Shari Straker, social content producer "I tested out the Curve Love version ($49, originally $65) in a size small short. The fit is perfect - the legging hit right at my ankle without bunching and sat right on my waist without being too high or low. Plus, there's a slight lift as well, which is flattering. The leggings are slightly compressive, too, but still flexible. They feel supportive when I'm walking on an incline, and I can still move around and stretch without feeling restricted. The waistband has a slight compression as well, which helps prevent it from riding down while walking and helps me keep my core engaged." — Anvita Reddy, former assistant editor, Shopping abercrombie.com"The White Lotus" Collection Shirt From A&FAbercrombie & Fitch Breezy Shirt ($53, originally $70) Embrace your inner-coastal grandma with this stylish, oversize shirt. Available in a range of neutral and earth-toned shades, the Breezy Shirt is perfect for a casual outing, especially during a vacation. Pair it with a bikini or one-piece underneath and it doubles as a cover-up for when you're lounging by the beach or poolside. abercrombie.comBest Long-Sleeved Top From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Long-Sleeve Ottoman Slash Top ($53, originally $70) As the weather transitions to warmer temps, you're more inclined to wear less layers, while staying warm on those unpredictable days. The Ottoman Slash Top is the perfect in-between of a long-sleeved top and a sweater, and it's available in several chic colors. The slim-fitting top can be worn with jeans, skirts, slacks, and more. Plus, its slash neckline will make any look feel more polished. abercrombie.comBest Cardigan From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Novelty Button Crew Cardigan ($53, originally $70) The transitional seasons are the perfect time to sport a comfy cardigan, and we love the silhouette and fall of the Novelty Button Crew Cardigan. Available in eight colors, this cardigan is embellished with gold- or silver-toned buttons for an elevated look. Throw it over a cute dress or a summer top during those brisk mornings and evenings, or you can wear it on its own.PS Photography | Macy Cate WilliamsBest Straight Jeans From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Curve Love Ultra High Rise '90s Straight Jean ($60, originally $90) If you're in the market for a pair of classic straight jeans, the Curve Love Ultra High Rise '90s Straight Jean is a figure-flattering bottom you'll wear for years to come. It's available in plenty of washes ranging from dark to light as well as options with a distressed look, but the medium wash is on sale at 30 percent off. Get it in extra short to extra long sizing ranging from 23 to 37. Read our former editor's full review of the Ultra High Rise 90s Straight Jean here. Editor Quote: Our former shopping director loves these jeans, stating, "I appreciate that these jeans remain supportive (without being restrictive!) throughout the entire wear. The style is very versatile; I can wear these jeans with a T-shirt and sneakers or a blazer and heels." - Macy Cate Williams, former content director, Shoppingabercrombie.comBest Relaxed Jeans From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Curve Love High Rise '90s Relaxed Jean ($60, originally $90) These High Rise '90s Relaxed Jean are such a cool girl jean that you'll need in your closet. The light wash is perfect for a casual, retro vibe, but it also comes in plenty of other washes and styles — and some are on sale. They're a versatile jean you can pair with sneakers, boots, and even dressed up with heels. Get them in extra short to extra long sizing ranging from 23 to 37. abercrombie.com"The White Lotus" Collection Sweatshirt From A&FAbercrombie & Fitch The White Lotus Graphic Crew Sweatshirt ($68, originally $90) This sweatshirt is ideal for cozy nights on the couch binge-watching your favorite season of "The White Lotus." It's made from the brand's ultra-soft fleece fabric and has an oversize fit. We adore this all-over graphic of Thailand shores, but if you prefer something more minimalist, it also comes in a print with the White Lotus hotel logo in navy blue. abercrombie.comBest Vintage Jeans From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch High Rise Vintage Straight Jean ($68, originally $90) If you're looking for a pair of stylish, vintage-inspired jeans, these are a classic cute pair for showing off your footwear. It's available in a range of light, medium, and dark washes. These pants also come in a handful of sizes ranging from 23 to 37, in extra short, short, regular, and long. abercrombie.comBest Straight Ankle Jeans From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Curve Love Ultra High Rise Ankle Straight Jean ($68, originally $90) If you're in the market for a pair of classic ankle jeans, these are a flattering style that offer comfort and stretch. They feature an ultra high-rise waistband that complements a tucked-in shirt or a seamless bodysuit. Plus, they come in a handful of washes. abercrombie.comBest Loose Jeans From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch High Rise Loose Jean ($68, originally $90) These high-rise jeans are made with lightweight rigid denim. Although they aren't stretchy, these jeans feature a relaxed fit at the waist and hips as well as a looser leg shape. They come in a wide range of denim washes, several of which are on sale at 25 percent off. abercrombie.comBest Cutout Maxi Dress From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch The A&F Giselle Pleated Cutout Maxi Dress ($70, originally $150) Show off your glam side at your next evening event in the gorgeous Giselle Pleated Cutout Maxi Dress. Available in four bold colors, this pleated maxi dress will turn heads for sure, especially with the side-slit cutouts and plunging V neckline. Pair it with heels and chunky silver- or gold-toned jewelry for a dressier look. abercrombie.comBest Casual Jumpsuit From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Traveler Jumpsuit ($77, originally $90) Abercrombie's Traveler Jumpsuit will be your new go-to travel outfit. It has adjustable wide straps and an elastic waist detail for a comfortable yet flattering fit. Plus, it has pockets! Get it in three stylish shades.abercrombie.comBest Leather Pants From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Curve Love Vegan Leather 90s Relaxed Pant ($83, originally $110) Leather pants have become a wardrobe staple, and these come in a classic black and a chocolate dark brown. Made from a quality vegan leather, the bottoms are flattering and comfortable to wear for long periods of time. They have a high rise design, which is ideal for sweater weather and layering.abercrombie.comBest Mesh Maxi Dress From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Mesh Asymmetrical Off-The-Shoulder Draped Maxi Dress ($90, originally $120) This asymmetrical number will impress at all your fancier events this year. Whether you are attending a fall or winter wedding or getting a head start on holiday party shopping, this floral dress will be your go-to. It's made from a stretchy mesh fabric that feels comfortable and flexible, and its ruched detailing makes for a flattering wear. abercrombie.comBest Puff Sleeve Midi Dress From Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch The A&F Emerson Poplin Puff Sleeve Midi Dress ($90, originally $120) If you love dramatic sleeves, the A&F Emerson Poplin Puff Sleeve Midi Dress is made for you. Available in a wide range of prints and colors, this flowy number is a flattering option for those who love a voluminous, flared look. It's perfect for vacations, brunches, or wedding events. Even better, it has pockets.Getty | Cheng XinActive Abercrombie & Fitch Promo Codes and SalesRight now, you can get 25 percent off everything from now until March 31. One thing to note is this sale excludes clearance and gift cards.Getty | SOPA ImagesAbercrombie & Fitch's Return PolicyAbercrombie & Fitch has a return policy of 30 days from the date of the last shipment, as long as you have your receipt, invoice, or order confirmation. Returns received after the 30-day mark will be refunded in an e-gift card for merchandise credit. If you love a style but just need a different size or color, you can exchange it in store or online through this return portal. -— Additional reporting by Kyley WarrenAnvita Reddy (she/her) is a former assistant editor for PS Shopping. She has a passion for products and reviews home gadgets, cookware, tech, and more. Having dealt with acne as a teenager and into adulthood, her expertise lies in beauty. At PS, she tested skin care, makeup, and hair care, plus countless other beauty products. Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer and editor with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She previously worked as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. Before joining PS, Kyley worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Who would have thought that our closets would be filled with Abercrombie & Fitch again?! Abercrombie has long been famous for its expansive collection of flattering jeans, which are editor-loved. But recently, the retailer went through a little makeover of its own; long gone are the days of logo-filled graphic T-shirts and limited denim offerings, now the brand is a haven for all types of fashion-lovers — and sizes.

It's the best place to shop for everything from stylish, elevated basics to vintage-inspired looks, seasonal trends, and even wedding guest dresses. The brand is clearly back and better than ever, and if TikTok hasn't already convinced you to shop at Abercrombie, let us do that for you. From trendy tops and elevated dresses to comfortable, tailored bottoms, Abercrombie has become synonymous with effortlessly chic clothing. Plus, if something doesn't fit quite right, or the color you've been eyeing is finally back in stock, the brand makes it convenient to file a return or exchange.

We love browsing the site for the brand's newest arrivals and even scoring a deal or two on a few pieces. So we rounded up our current favorite wardrobe essentials and dresses from Abercrombie, both new and on sale, so you know what's worth buying. Keep reading to shop our top picks from Abercrombie & Fitch, or jump ahead to the category you're looking for.

Best Tank Top From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch Essential Scoopneck Tank ($19, originally $25)

The Essential Scoopneck Tank and Abercrombie & Fitch is a wardrobe staple you'll use year round, so you might as well stock up on a few of them while it's on sale. The top is made of 95 percent cotton and five percent elastane, which makes it both soft and stretchy. Get the style in a variety of neutral colors and patterns that are perfect for pairing with multiple pieces. Check out our editor's complete review of the Essential Scoopneck Tank here.

Editor Quote: One of our editors loves it so much, she has one in nearly every color. "It boasts a slim but not-too-tight fit that's casually sexy. (And no, I can't see my seamless bra through it!) It looks chic worn on its own or underneath a jacket . . . it lands just above my belly button, which I love because I'm almost always wearing high-waisted bottoms." - Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shopping

Best Tailored Pants From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch Sloane Tailored Pant ($20, originally $90)

These pants are not only one of the brand's bestsellers, but they're also loved by TikTok. The bottoms are perfect for creating a put-together, elevated look, whether you're going out for brunch or enjoying post-work cocktails. Plus, the wardrobe essential is available in eight core colors and a few limited edition colors on sale. Read more in our editor's in-depth review of the Sloane Tailored pant.

Editor Quote: "The material feels cooling on the body, almost like a spandex type of fabric. And despite their casual fit, the pants also look undeniably flattering while on, thanks to their tailored drape and pleated accents. I'm happy to wear them to a work event or just while lounging around the house; they truly work for every occasion." - Kyley Warren, former assistant editor, Shopping

Best Mesh Top From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch Draped Mesh Top ($30, originally $40)

This mesh top is a stylish layering piece you can wear for a night out. Featuring a slightly ruched bodice and asymmetrical hemline, this mesh top has a slim-fitting silhouette with a tuckable length. Perfect for concerts, festivals, or just a girls night out, you can get creative with how you style this versatile piece.

Best Slim Fit Top From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch The A&F Paloma Top ($38, originally $50)

The A&F Paloma Top will be your new wardrobe essential, and several prints and colors are on sale right now. Its slim-fitting silhouette hugs you in all the right places, while the ruching details make it all the more flattering.

Best Dipped-Waist Dress From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch Dipped-Waist Sweetheart Maxi Dress ($40, originally $120)

This gorgeous Dipped-Waist Sweetheart Maxi Dress delivers main character energy. Perfect for dinner dates or dressier events, this piece has a gorgeous dipped waist detail and a voluminous skirt. If you're a bride, the color is ideal for any pre-wedding photoshoot.

Best Crewneck Sweater From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch The A&F Madeline Crew Sweater ($45, originally $60)

Available in several prints and colors, The A&F Madeline Crew Sweater is a bestseller worth stocking up on for the fall and winter. Several styles are on sale, including festive fair isle patterns. It's made from a soft yarn fabric that makes you feel cozy even if you dress up. Pair it with jeans or a skirt with a loose French tuck for an elevated look.

Best Leggings From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch YPB sculptLUX 7/8-Length Leggings ($49, originally $65)

The YPB sculptLUX 7/8-Length Leggings are an editor-backed favorite for their flattering yet supportive wear. Made with a sweat-wicking four-way stretch fabric, these leggings ensure you feel comfortable no matter how you move. They are sculpting and smoothing without feeling too restrictive, and they boast a hidden interior waistband pocket. Read more of our thoughts on Abercrombie & Fitch's YPB Activewear here.

Editor Quote: "I could see myself lounging around the house in this (which I did), running errands, and working out. I kept checking the tag because the material is so comfortable, and I just had to know what it was made out of. The leggings are super high-waisted, which I love, especially for working out. The design initially caught my eye because it's different from any athleisure outfits I've been seeing lately." — Shari Straker, social content producer

"I tested out the Curve Love version ($49, originally $65) in a size small short. The fit is perfect - the legging hit right at my ankle without bunching and sat right on my waist without being too high or low. Plus, there's a slight lift as well, which is flattering. The leggings are slightly compressive, too, but still flexible. They feel supportive when I'm walking on an incline, and I can still move around and stretch without feeling restricted. The waistband has a slight compression as well, which helps prevent it from riding down while walking and helps me keep my core engaged." — Anvita Reddy, former assistant editor, Shopping

"The White Lotus" Collection Shirt From A&F

Abercrombie & Fitch Breezy Shirt ($53, originally $70)

Embrace your inner-coastal grandma with this stylish, oversize shirt. Available in a range of neutral and earth-toned shades, the Breezy Shirt is perfect for a casual outing, especially during a vacation. Pair it with a bikini or one-piece underneath and it doubles as a cover-up for when you're lounging by the beach or poolside.

Best Long-Sleeved Top From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch Long-Sleeve Ottoman Slash Top ($53, originally $70)

As the weather transitions to warmer temps, you're more inclined to wear less layers, while staying warm on those unpredictable days. The Ottoman Slash Top is the perfect in-between of a long-sleeved top and a sweater, and it's available in several chic colors. The slim-fitting top can be worn with jeans, skirts, slacks, and more. Plus, its slash neckline will make any look feel more polished.

Best Cardigan From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch Novelty Button Crew Cardigan ($53, originally $70)

The transitional seasons are the perfect time to sport a comfy cardigan, and we love the silhouette and fall of the Novelty Button Crew Cardigan. Available in eight colors, this cardigan is embellished with gold- or silver-toned buttons for an elevated look. Throw it over a cute dress or a summer top during those brisk mornings and evenings, or you can wear it on its own.

Best Straight Jeans From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch Curve Love Ultra High Rise '90s Straight Jean ($60, originally $90)

If you're in the market for a pair of classic straight jeans, the Curve Love Ultra High Rise '90s Straight Jean is a figure-flattering bottom you'll wear for years to come. It's available in plenty of washes ranging from dark to light as well as options with a distressed look, but the medium wash is on sale at 30 percent off. Get it in extra short to extra long sizing ranging from 23 to 37. Read our former editor's full review of the Ultra High Rise 90s Straight Jean here.

Editor Quote: Our former shopping director loves these jeans, stating, "I appreciate that these jeans remain supportive (without being restrictive!) throughout the entire wear. The style is very versatile; I can wear these jeans with a T-shirt and sneakers or a blazer and heels." - Macy Cate Williams, former content director, Shopping

Best Relaxed Jeans From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch Curve Love High Rise '90s Relaxed Jean ($60, originally $90)

These High Rise '90s Relaxed Jean are such a cool girl jean that you'll need in your closet. The light wash is perfect for a casual, retro vibe, but it also comes in plenty of other washes and styles — and some are on sale. They're a versatile jean you can pair with sneakers, boots, and even dressed up with heels. Get them in extra short to extra long sizing ranging from 23 to 37.

"The White Lotus" Collection Sweatshirt From A&F

Abercrombie & Fitch The White Lotus Graphic Crew Sweatshirt ($68, originally $90)

This sweatshirt is ideal for cozy nights on the couch binge-watching your favorite season of "The White Lotus." It's made from the brand's ultra-soft fleece fabric and has an oversize fit. We adore this all-over graphic of Thailand shores, but if you prefer something more minimalist, it also comes in a print with the White Lotus hotel logo in navy blue.

Best Vintage Jeans From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch High Rise Vintage Straight Jean ($68, originally $90)

If you're looking for a pair of stylish, vintage-inspired jeans, these are a classic cute pair for showing off your footwear. It's available in a range of light, medium, and dark washes. These pants also come in a handful of sizes ranging from 23 to 37, in extra short, short, regular, and long.

Best Straight Ankle Jeans From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch Curve Love Ultra High Rise Ankle Straight Jean ($68, originally $90)

If you're in the market for a pair of classic ankle jeans, these are a flattering style that offer comfort and stretch. They feature an ultra high-rise waistband that complements a tucked-in shirt or a seamless bodysuit. Plus, they come in a handful of washes.

Best Loose Jeans From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch High Rise Loose Jean ($68, originally $90)

These high-rise jeans are made with lightweight rigid denim. Although they aren't stretchy, these jeans feature a relaxed fit at the waist and hips as well as a looser leg shape. They come in a wide range of denim washes, several of which are on sale at 25 percent off.

Best Cutout Maxi Dress From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch The A&F Giselle Pleated Cutout Maxi Dress ($70, originally $150)

Show off your glam side at your next evening event in the gorgeous Giselle Pleated Cutout Maxi Dress. Available in four bold colors, this pleated maxi dress will turn heads for sure, especially with the side-slit cutouts and plunging V neckline. Pair it with heels and chunky silver- or gold-toned jewelry for a dressier look.

Best Casual Jumpsuit From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch Traveler Jumpsuit ($77, originally $90)

Abercrombie's Traveler Jumpsuit will be your new go-to travel outfit. It has adjustable wide straps and an elastic waist detail for a comfortable yet flattering fit. Plus, it has pockets! Get it in three stylish shades.

Best Leather Pants From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch Curve Love Vegan Leather 90s Relaxed Pant ($83, originally $110)

Leather pants have become a wardrobe staple, and these come in a classic black and a chocolate dark brown. Made from a quality vegan leather, the bottoms are flattering and comfortable to wear for long periods of time. They have a high rise design, which is ideal for sweater weather and layering.

Best Mesh Maxi Dress From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch Mesh Asymmetrical Off-The-Shoulder Draped Maxi Dress ($90, originally $120)

This asymmetrical number will impress at all your fancier events this year. Whether you are attending a fall or winter wedding or getting a head start on holiday party shopping, this floral dress will be your go-to. It's made from a stretchy mesh fabric that feels comfortable and flexible, and its ruched detailing makes for a flattering wear.

Best Puff Sleeve Midi Dress From Abercrombie & Fitch

Abercrombie & Fitch The A&F Emerson Poplin Puff Sleeve Midi Dress ($90, originally $120)

If you love dramatic sleeves, the A&F Emerson Poplin Puff Sleeve Midi Dress is made for you. Available in a wide range of prints and colors, this flowy number is a flattering option for those who love a voluminous, flared look. It's perfect for vacations, brunches, or wedding events. Even better, it has pockets.

Active Abercrombie & Fitch Promo Codes and Sales

Right now, you can get 25 percent off everything from now until March 31. One thing to note is this sale excludes clearance and gift cards.

Abercrombie & Fitch's Return Policy

Abercrombie & Fitch has a return policy of 30 days from the date of the last shipment, as long as you have your receipt, invoice, or order confirmation. Returns received after the 30-day mark will be refunded in an e-gift card for merchandise credit. If you love a style but just need a different size or color, you can exchange it in store or online through this return portal.

— Additional reporting by Kyley Warren

Anvita Reddy (she/her) is a former assistant editor for PS Shopping. She has a passion for products and reviews home gadgets, cookware, tech, and more. Having dealt with acne as a teenager and into adulthood, her expertise lies in beauty. At PS, she tested skin care, makeup, and hair care, plus countless other beauty products.

Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer and editor with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She previously worked as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. Before joining PS, Kyley worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.
